name: Uberlabs, Inc.
description: Provider of an image recognition and visual listening platform. The company uses advanced image recognition and artificial intelligence technologies to identify image-based risks and opportunities while analyzing user-generated photos in social channels, enabling brands to understand how their products are consumed and visualized by users in their daily lives.
